tag_professor: Respected (4)  Inspirational (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: RESPECTED  TOUGH GRADER  SO MANY PAPERS
comments: Tom is an awesome guy, and you can tell that he genuinely cares about his students. He grades hard, but the amount you learn is worth it. You will get several E\'s. I fondly recall my first \'E\' and the angry suburban mom email I sent him about it, but YOU\'LL BE FINE. A year after his class, I still hang with Tom to gossip and get advice.

tag_professor: Respected (4)  Inspirational (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  HILARIOUS
comments: Tom is very knowledgeable, understanding and always willing to help with any issues. He makes class fun and doesn\'t insult anyone\'s intelligence. With that being said, he\'s a tough grader. If you do well in a Tom Blodgett class, you\'ll do well in just about any class. He makes you earn it.

tag_professor: Respected (4)  Inspirational (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Tom is one of the best professors I\'ve ever had. He makes the class super fun so it doesn\'t feel like it drags on and on forever. It was a class I wanted to go to and looked forward to most!

tag_professor: Respected (4)  Inspirational (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Tom has to be one of my favorite teachers ever. Looking back, I would take every class with him. Yes, the class was difficult as 201 is your sort-of intro to reporting, but I learned so much with him as my teacher. He\'s hilarious and is great at keeping the teachings relevant and meaningful.

tag_professor: Respected (4)  Inspirational (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: He is by far my favorite Cronkite professor yet! He is hilarious and it is always a pleasure to be in his class. He always provides good feedback on assignments and is overall very enthusiastic about the subject matter and ensuring that his students succeed. I would take every class from him if I could.

tag_professor: Respected (4)  Inspirational (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Tom is an awesome guy who will do his best to make sure you stay awake all class. He\'s really funny and helps you become a better writer!

tag_professor: Respected (4)  Inspirational (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I loved Tom! He is a great teacher, who really wanted students to succeed. He helped me a lot with my writing skills. I would strongly recommend that you take his class because it\'s a fun class and you learn a lot.

tag_professor: Respected (4)  Inspirational (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Doesn\'t use textbook. The information from the lectures and newspapers is all he quizzes on. I\'ve been told he\'s one of the easier teachers, but he\'s a tough grader to me. He does want you to succeed, but he doesn\'t make it clear how to succeed. He is very unpredictable. Uses cryptic wording in quizzes. His teaching style is a little too informal.

tag_professor: Respected (4)  Inspirational (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Great teacher! He is a lot of fun and really wants you to learn how to write different news stories. I learned a lot and expectations were clear. You wont regret his class!
